abstract: Brick Theater in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, announces lineup for 2013 Game Play festival, its annual fusion of live theater and video games.

headline.main: Brick Announces Lineup for Game Play Festival
headline.print_headline: Brick Announces Lineup For Game Play Festival

lead_paragraph: The Brick Theater in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, has announced the lineup for its annual fusion of live theater and video games.
snippet: The Brick Theater in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, has announced the lineup for its annual fusion of live theater and video games.
